sub_title: Senior Project Finance Advisor - Green Energy, Renewables, Nuclear
summary:
Result-oriented and innovative financial industry professional with a 18-year Investment Banking experience, covering the Canada, Europe and Middle East. Energetic and efficient professional with extensive experience in deal origination, execution and restructuring including complex multi-party negotiations, due diligence, analysis and preparation. 

Specialities: Project Finance Advisory in Green Energy, Renewables, Nuclear / Debt and Project Structuring / Portfolio Management / Corporate Finance / Restructuring and Refinancing / Due diligence for investment opportunities
